nodes.name: canMakerTerminate
distributeFundsInEscrow
distributeDisputeFunds
getArbiterFeeAmount

acceptLastMilestone(bytes32).details: Project owner accepts the current delivered milestone.

canClientTerminate(bytes32).details: Client can terminate milestone if the last milestone delivery is overdue and     milestone is not on hold. By default termination is not available.
canClientTerminate(bytes32).return: `true` if the last project's milestone could be terminated by client.

canMakerTerminate(bytes32).details: Maker can terminate milestone if delivery review is taking longer than project feedback window and     milestone is not on hold, or if client doesn't start the next milestone for a period longer than     project's milestone start window. By default termination is not available.
canMakerTerminate(bytes32).return: `true` if the last project's milestone could be terminated by maker.

canStartDispute(bytes32).details: Check if target is ready for a dispute.

checkEligibility(bytes32,address).details: Check eligibility of a given address to perform operations,     basically the address should be either client or maker.

deliverLastMilestone(bytes32).details: Maker delivers the current active milestone.

disputeSettledTerminate(bytes32,address,.details: React to an active dispute settlement with given parameters.

params._arbiterWithdrawalAddress: An `address` for sending out arbiter compensation.
params._isInternal: A `bool` indicating if dispute was settled by participants without an arbiter.

disputeStartedFreeze(bytes32).details: Prepare arbitration target for a started dispute.

isLastMilestoneAccepted(bytes32).details: Returns the last project milestone completion status and number.
isLastMilestoneAccepted(bytes32).return: isAccepted A boolean flag for acceptance state, and milestoneNumber for the last milestone.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

rejectLastDeliverable(bytes32).details: Project owner rejects the current active milestone.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

setRelayContractAddress(address).details: Set the new address of the `DecoRelay` contract.

params._newAddress: An address of the new contract.

startMilestone(bytes32,uint256,address,u.details: Starts a new milestone for the project and deposit ETH in smart contract`s escrow.

params._agreementHash: A `bytes32` hash of the agreement id.
params._depositAmount: An `uint` of wei that are going to be deposited for a new milestone.
params._duration: An `uint` seconds of a milestone duration.

terminateLastMilestone(bytes32,address).details: Either project owner or maker can terminate the project in certain cases      and the current active milestone must be marked as terminated for records-keeping.     All blocked funds should be distributed in favor of eligible project party.     The termination with this method initiated only by project contract.

transferAnyERC20Token(address,uint256).details: Allows to trasnfer any ERC20 tokens from the contract balance to owner's address.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: Contract for Milesotone events and actions handling.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
